creditline: Gift of funds from Tamara and Michael Root
description: oblong ceramic tea bowl with rough, textured surface; vertical ridges repeat a pattern around the outer side of tea bowl; mostly white ceramic, with spots of green glazing dotted around outer edge, as well as a curved passage of green pigment on the inner side of bowl; mottled green and brown areas run horizontally around C of bowl, with shiny spots of glazing throughout; pale peach areas at upper and lower sides of bowl; diagonal line intersects with a forked horizontal line, in which green glazing collects in the crevices, on one side of bowl; wooden box with tan cloth included
title: Kō (vast, generous, expansive light, vast sky)
